Author: skydiver89
Text: It landed me in the hospital shortly after telling him. Like...what? Either way,it is fucking me up hardcore. Like I feel he never listens to me and doesn't understand me at all. I got diagnosed with bpd. And once broke down crying for no reason. He asked why I was like this. Its like dude I have bpd, you know, why the fuck wouldn't you do research on it? If you love me, why the fuck not? Sorry. Just very very upset right now.

Author: cottoncandymandy
Text: If you haven't talked in depth about it with him then he probably didn't realize it was a bad thing for you. Two years is a long time for someone to remember a small talk that never got talked about again or explained fully. More than likely he just wanted to send you a treat. Maybe now would be a good time to have that in depth talk so you don't spiral in the future. If you don't want them throw them away, Give them to a work friend, your postal carrier as a gift or whatever.
